title: Lesson 8: Last Things (Eschatology)
description: Caring for the poor and marginalized as a reflection of God's heart.

blocks.text: The Gospel doesn't just save our souls; it transforms how we treat the vulnerable. God has always had a special care for the poor, the orphan, the widow, and the marginalized.
He has told you, O man, what is good; and what does the Lord require of you but to do justice, and to love kindness, and to walk humbly with your God?
9.1 - What is one practical way you or your small group can show kindness to the vulnerable in your community?
Who are you currently BLESSing? Who are you praying for and actively moving toward? What is one specific step you are taking this week?
